name: Glint - HD
description:
5 Stars from AppAdvice
"One of the most stunning puzzle games of the year"
- Christine Chan, AppAdvice

"One of the freshest feeling puzzlers on the App Store"
- Harry Slater, Pocket Gamer

Featured “App of the Day” on AppAdvice & AppSpy

Glint is a stylish, fast-paced puzzler that mixes mesmerizing visuals with unique and satisfying gameplay. Dodge bombs, collect rings and score exciting power-ups as you climb through the innumerable levels bursting with brilliant colors and stunning visual effects. Named “one of the most stunning puzzle games of the year,” Glint will dazzle your senses while challenging your perception of what mobile games can be.

With over 100 levels of challenging gameplay, each with its own distinctive set of colors, Glint will keep you entertained with non-stop, heart-pounding action.

Each world of Glint introduces a new game element to challenge your skills at tapping, dodging and swiping.

In addition to Glint’s visuals, enjoy an engaging soundtrack along with crisp sound effects as you crush dots and score rings in this arcade-style puzzler.

Non-stop fun in the form of power-ups, game mechanics, and never-ending increasing difficulty:
+ Single, double and quad dots
+ Time dots
+ Gameboard tilting
+ Nukes
+ Bombs
+ Release dots
+ Giant dots
+ Tap dots
+ More added every day

=====
NAME YOUR OWN LEVEL
=====
Did you reach the end of Glint? Welcome to the elite players club!
While you’re waiting for the next set of levels to hit the App Store, send a screenshot of the “Noah’s Arcade” level to @glintgame on Twitter (or to glint@ensomniac.com) and we’ll let you pick the name and description of your own level in the next update!
